metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0468 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A remote code execution vulnerability in Mediaserver could enable anattacker using a specially crafted file to cause memory corruption duringmedia file and data processing. This issue is rated as Critical due to thepossibility of remote code execution within the context of the Mediaserverprocess. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1. Android ID:A-33351708.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
